description: Shows metrics of a single node.

panels.description: Version number of node software.
panels.title: GoShimmer

panels.description: Shortened version of the public key of the node.
panels.title: Node Identity

panels.description: Shows the time elapsed since the start of the node.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Describes if the node is in synced state.
panels.title: Synced

panels.description: Aggregated BPS for all block types in the communication layer.
panels.title: Total BPS

panels.description: Amount of access mana this node has
panels.title: Access Mana (Current)

panels.description: Amount of consensus mana this node has.
panels.title: Consensus Mana (Current)

panels.description: Size of the ledger database.
panels.title: Total Database Size

panels.description: Size of the ledger database.
panels.title: Permanent DB Size

panels.description: Size of the ledger database.
panels.title: Prunable DB size

panels.description: Size of the ledger database.
panels.title: Retainer DB size

panels.description: Shows tips in block and value layer.
panels.title: Tips

panels.description: Number of currently connected neighbors.
panels.title: Current Neighbors

panels.description: Calculated for each dropped neighbor.
panels.title: AvgNeighbor Connection Lifetime

panels.description: Amount of newly registered neighbor connections.
panels.title: New Neighbor Connections

panels.description: Amount of neighbor connections dropped.
panels.title: Dropped Neighbor Connections

panels.description: Number of blocks requested through solidification.
panels.title: Solidifier-requested blocks per second

panels.description: Number of blocks requested through solidification.
panels.title: Solidifier-requested blocks total

panels.description: Number of blocks in missingBlockStore. These are the block the node knows it doesn't have and tries to requests them.
panels.title: Missing Blocks

panels.description: Describes the amount of total, solid and not solid blocks in the node's database.
panels.title: Blocks in Database

panels.description: Number of blocks currently requested by the block tangle.
panels.title: Block Request Queue Size

panels.description: Average time it takes to solidify blocks.
panels.title: Average Solidification Time

panels.description: Amount of access mana this node has
panels.title: Current Mana

panels.description: Average mana of a node i nthe network.
panels.title: Average Mana

panels.description: Standard deviation of mana of nodes in the network.
panels.title: Standard Deviation of Mana

panels.description: Average access and consensus mana of a nodes nneighbours.
panels.title: Average neighbours mana

panels.description: Total Access & Consensus Mana In the network.
panels.title: Total Mana

panels.description: Histogram of access mana of nodes.
panels.title: Access Mana Distribution In Network

panels.description: Histogram of consensus mana of nodes.
panels.title: Consensus Mana Distribution in Network

panels.description: Amount of access mana this node has
panels.title: Access Mana

panels.description: Amount of access mana of nodes in the network.
panels.title: Network Wide Access Mana

panels.description: Allocation of access mana of nodes in the network.
panels.title: Access Mana Allocation

panels.description: Amount of consensus mana this node has.
panels.title: Consensus Mana

panels.description: Amount of consensus mana of nodes in the network.
panels.title: Network Wide Consensus Mana

panels.description: Allocation of consensus mana of nodes in the network.
panels.title: Consensus Mana Allocation

panels.description: Indicates an average time it takes for a block to be finalized since it is received by the node.
panels.title: Block finalization time

panels.description: Indicates an average time it takes for a block to be finalized since it is received by the node.
panels.title: Conflict finalization time
Average number of parents by type

panels.description: Rate at which scheduler processes blocks from the buffer
panels.title: Scheduling rate

panels.description: Blocks skipped by the scheduler, because they were confirmed before.
panels.title: Skipped blocks

title: GoShimmer Local Metrics
